short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the details of listings including their tags, and metadata so you can improve your store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Etsy Listing Assistant â€“ the ultimate tool for Etsy sellers and enthusiasts! This powerful Chrome extension is designed to enhance your Etsy selling experience by providing quick and easy access to detailed listing information directly from your browser.

Key Features:
Instant Listing Information: Get comprehensive details of any Etsy listing in just one click. Whether you're browsing for ideas or researching competitive products, Etsy Listing Assistant offers a seamless way to access information like title, tags, materials, and more.

Effortless Copy Functionality: With a user-friendly interface, copy important listing details in an instant. Our intuitive design includes a 'Copy to Clipboard' feature for key sections of the listing, making it easier than ever to gather and use information for research or analysis.

Elegant and User-friendly Design: Experience a clean, intuitive interface that blends seamlessly with your browsing. The extension's design ensures that you can view and copy listing details without being overwhelmed by clutter or unnecessary elements.

Real-time Data Access: Stay updated with the latest listing details. Our extension fetches real-time information from Etsy, ensuring that you always have access to the most current data.

Secure and Reliable: Your privacy and security are paramount. Etsy Listing Assistant only accesses public listing data and does not store any personal information, ensuring a safe and secure experience.

One-Click Convenience: No more tedious navigation or multiple tabs. Access all the information you need about an Etsy listing with just one click on the extension icon.

Customizable Display: Choose which sections of the listing details you want to view and copy. The extension allows you to tailor the display to your specific needs and preferences.

Visual Feedback for Actions: Interactive icons and visual cues provide clear feedback for your actions, like copying information, enhancing the overall user experience.

How It Works:
1. Navigate to an Etsy listing page.
2. Click on the Etsy Listing Assistant icon in your browser toolbar.
3. Instantly view detailed information about the listing at the top of the page.
4. Use the 'Copy to Clipboard' feature to quickly copy specific sections of the listing details.

Use Cases:
Etsy Sellers: Enhance your market research by quickly accessing and comparing details of similar listings.
Shoppers: Easily gather information about products you love for later reference.
Market Researchers: Efficiently collect data on Etsy market trends and popular products.

Privacy and Security:
We value your privacy and security. Etsy Listing Assistant does not store any personal data or sensitive information. It operates by accessing public listing information available on Etsy.

Support:
We are committed to providing an excellent user experience. If you have any questions, suggestions, or need assistance, please feel free to reach out to our support team.

Get Etsy Listing Assistant today and revolutionize the way you interact with Etsy listings.
